subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After a harrowing spring injury, the Reds’ Aroldis Chapman had one of the most dominant seasons. Chapman can be a free agent after 2016, which puts the Reds in a quandary.
snippet: After a harrowing spring injury, the Reds’ Aroldis Chapman had one of the most dominant seasons. Chapman can be a free agent after 2016, which puts the Reds in a quandary.
